full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA CHEN DGRA LHA MCHED DGU'I BSKANG GSO DKAR PO RGYAL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES DGRA LHA'I BSKANG GSO DKAR PO RGYAL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MCHED GROGS RDO RJE ZHES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES 'DOD MOS KYANG YIG CHA DANG BSKANG GSO MA MTHONG BAS, GU RU'I GTER MA DGRA LHA DPANG BSTOD ZHIG LA GZHI BYAS LA BKOD PA 'DI NI SNGAGS 'CHANG SMON LAM LHUN GRUB GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, RIG GNAS SKANG GNYIS SOGS DU MA LA MKHAS PA'I RNAM DPYOD CAN BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG GO , ,,ZHUS DAG ,)
